Invitation.Description:
Your presence is of importance to us, we need your blessings.
We request the pleasure of your company at the wedding of

WeddingLocation.Address:
Amar Hind Mandal,
Dadar West,
Maharashtra 400028

WeddingCeremoney.Title: Wedding Ceremony
WeddingCeremoney.Description: Request you to bless us with your presence while we take our wedding wows & get hitched for life.

Reception.Title: Reception
Reception.Description: To celebrate their wedding join the Reception Party followed by the marriage ceremony. Keep your blessings full & stomachs empty, dinner is on us.

GetToLocation.Title: *** AT AMAR HIND MANDAL, DADAR WEST ***

ByTransport1.Title: by Train
ByTransport1.via: You can get down at Dadar Station and take a cab. Cabs are readily available from Dadar east exit or you can walk outwards to West and get a cab from Plaza Bus stop. You can also take a Bus for Prabodhankar Thakre Chowk.

ByTransport2.Title: By Cab
ByTransport2.via: You can take a metered cab from your source and ask for the below address.

via.p: If you prefer traveling by public transport, here are a few options:
You should get down at Prabodhankar Thakre Chowk bus stop.

Bride.Title: Bride
Bride.Description: An engineer by profession, a voracious reader & a foodie.

Groom.Title: Groom
Groom.Description: Loves to build things, a music lover & a traveller.
